trans-unit.source: Provides methods used to render a button control with or without visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于呈现具有或不使用视觉样式的按钮控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The ButtonRenderer class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a button control.
trans-unit.target: ButtonRenderer 类提供了一套`static`可以用于呈现按钮控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: To draw a button, use one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer.DrawButton%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制一个按钮，使用之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer.DrawButton%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer.DrawButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods provide a variety of options, such as drawing text or an image on the button.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法提供了各种选项，如绘制文本或图像的按钮。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer.DrawButton%2A> will draw the button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer.DrawButton%2A>将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的按钮。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer.DrawButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer.DrawButton%2A> will draw the button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer.DrawButton%2A>将绘制具有经典 Windows 样式的按钮。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer.DrawButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，如果您正在绘制的操作系统中的当前视觉样式设置应自动匹配的自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: This class wraps the functionality of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=fullName> that is set to one of the elements exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.PushButton?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 此类包装<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=fullName>设置为其中一个元素由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.PushButton?displayProperty=fullName>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.PushButton?displayProperty=fullName>公开</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=fullName>的功能

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Draws a button control in the specified state and bounds.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指定的状态和边界中的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它会绘制带有经典 Windows 样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它指定按钮的边界。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref>指定按钮的可视状态的值。

trans-unit.source: Draws a button control in the specified state and bounds, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指定的状态和边界，以及可选的聚焦框的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它会绘制带有经典 Windows 样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它指定按钮的边界。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw a focus rectangle on the button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要在按钮; 上绘制聚焦框否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref>指定按钮的可视状态的值。

trans-unit.source: Draws a button control in the specified state and bounds, with the specified image, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指定的状态和指定边界内的指定的图像，和一个可选焦点矩形的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它会绘制带有经典 Windows 样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它指定按钮的边界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw on the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>在按钮上绘制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the dimensions of `image`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示的尺寸`image`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw a focus rectangle on the button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要在按钮; 上绘制聚焦框否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref>指定按钮的可视状态的值。

trans-unit.source: Draws a button control in the specified state and bounds, with the specified text, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指定的状态和指定边界内以指定的文本和可选的聚焦框中的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它会绘制带有经典 Windows 样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它指定按钮的边界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to draw on the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>在按钮上绘制。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `buttonText`.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `buttonText`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw a focus rectangle on the button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要在按钮; 上绘制聚焦框否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref>指定按钮的可视状态的值。

trans-unit.source: Draws a button control in the specified state and bounds, with the specified text and text formatting, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指定的状态和指定边界内具有指定的文本和文本格式设置，和一个可选焦点矩形的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它会绘制带有经典 Windows 样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它指定按钮的边界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to draw on the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>在按钮上绘制。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `buttonText`.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `buttonText`.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values to apply to `buttonText`.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref>值将应用于`buttonText`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw a focus rectangle on the button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要在按钮; 上绘制聚焦框否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref>指定按钮的可视状态的值。

trans-unit.source: Draws a button control in the specified state and bounds, with the specified text and image, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指定的状态和指定边界内具有指定的文本和图像，和一个可选焦点矩形的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它会绘制带有经典 Windows 样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制按钮。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它指定按钮的边界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to draw on the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>在按钮上绘制。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `buttonText`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw on the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>在按钮上绘制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the dimensions of `image`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示的尺寸`image`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw a focus rectangle on the button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要在按钮; 上绘制聚焦框否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref>指定按钮的可视状态的值。

trans-unit.source: Draws a button control in the specified state and bounds; with the specified text, text formatting, and image; and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指定的状态和边界; 中的按钮控件具有指定的文本、 文本格式设置，和图像;和可选的聚焦框。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will draw the button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它会绘制带有经典 Windows 样式的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它指定按钮的边界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to draw on the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>在按钮上绘制。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `buttonText`.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `buttonText`.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values to apply to `buttonText`.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref>值将应用于`buttonText`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw on the button.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>在按钮上绘制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the dimensions of `image`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示的尺寸`image`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw a focus rectangle on the button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要在按钮; 上绘制聚焦框否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref>指定按钮的可视状态的值。

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of a control's parent in the specified area.
trans-unit.target: 指定的区域中绘制背景的控件的父级。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the background of the parent of `childControl`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制的父级的背景`childControl`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which to draw the parent control's background.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>要在其中绘制父控件的背景。

trans-unit.source: This rectangle should be inside the child control’s bounds.
trans-unit.target: 将此矩形应子控件的边界内。

trans-unit.source: The control whose parent's background will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 控件将绘制其父级的背景。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the background of the button has semitransparent or alpha-blended pieces.
trans-unit.target: 指示背景的按钮是否具有半透明或 alpha 混合块。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.PushButtonState"></xref>指定按钮的可视状态的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the background of the button has semitransparent or alpha-blended pieces; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果按钮的背景有半透明或 alpha 混合块;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否呈现器使用的应用程序状态以确定呈现样式。

trans-unit.source: If the RenderMatchingApplicationState property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer> uses the setting from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the rendering style.
trans-unit.target: 如果 RenderMatchingApplicationState 属性为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>使用从设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来确定呈现样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: If RenderMatchingApplicationState is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果 RenderMatchingApplicationState `false`，呈现器将始终使用视觉样式来呈现。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应用程序状态用于确定呈现样式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
